title: Naith Longbow (6C21)
text:
Set:	Ents of Fangorn
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Elven
Twilight:	1
Card Type:	Possession • Ranged Weapon
Strength:	+1
Game Text:	Bearer must be an Elf companion. Archery: Exert bearer to discard the top card of your draw deck. If it is an [Elven] card, exert a minion.
Lore:	”'Show them no mercy, for you shall receive none.'”
Rarity:	C
